summary.span: 允许 WPF 应用程序对所有用户界面元素禁用每英寸点数 (dpi) 识别。

span.span: Allows WPF applications to disable dots per inch (dpi) awareness for all user interface elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序是 dpi 感知，这将影响如何计算用户界面布局。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications are dpi aware, which affects how user interface layout is calculated. 但是，应用程序可以通过添加禁用 dpi 识别对应用程序程序集。However, an application can disable dpi awareness by adding the to the application assembly. > [!CAUTION] > 它是**不**建议将此属性设置为应用程序，除非你需要所有用户界面元素的应用程序以进行非 dpi 感知。It is **not** recommended that you set this attribute for your application, unless you need all user interface elements of your application to be non-dpi aware. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁用的 Dpi 感知[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序通过声明在程序集级别。The following example shows how to disable Dpi awareness for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application by declaring at the assembly level.
